S48adm 4> db2 -t

db2 => connect to S48;

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

create tablespace S48#EL750D in nodegroup SAPNODEGRP_P06

pagesize 16384

extentsize 2 prefetchsize automatic bufferpool IBMDEFAULTBP

dropped table recovery off;

grant use of tablespace S48#EL750D to public;

create tablespace S48#EL750I in nodegroup SAPNODEGRP_P06

pagesize 16384

extentsize 2 prefetchsize automatic bufferpool IBMDEFAULTBP

dropped table recovery off;

grant use of tablespace S48#EL750I to public;

terminate;
